EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._validationPayload: The validation payload required for the module

params.interfaceID: The ID of the interface to check.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

ArrayLengthMismatch().notice: Error thrown when an array length mismatch occurs

OnlyPortalOwner().notice: Error thrown when someone else than the portal's owner is trying to revoke

SignerNotAuthorized().notice: Error thrown when a signer is not authorized by the module

SignerAuthorized(address).notice: Event emitted when the authorized signers are set

constructor.notice: Contract constructor sets the portal registry

run((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes),bytes,a.notice: The main method for the module, running the check

setAuthorizedSigners(address).notice: Set the accepted status of schemaIds

supportsInterface(bytes4).notice: Checks if the contract implements the Module interface.

userdoc.notice: This module can be used by portal to         require a signature from an authorized signer         before issuing attestations.
